name: Desert Ravagers
description:
Objective:
Complete parkour as fast as you can. Do 360° on air to get speed boost. Try to beat your evil twin (yes you've one. Just complete the run to spawn him)
This game is developed for Super Game Pack 1 in 2 weeks. Check out other games here

Controls:
UP / W: accelerate
DOWN / S: brake / air brake
LEFT / A lean left on air
RIGHT / D: lean right on air

Pro Tips:
Try to stay on the ground to accelerate further (especially on downhills). Doing 360° boosts speed for 3 seconds. Crashing cancels the trick (and not good for your brain health)

Credits:
design & code: Deniz Aydınoğlu

Sound Credits:
http://soundbible.com/1810-Wind.html
http://www.looperman.com/loops/?mid=hamood
http://freesound.org/people/Slave2theLight/sounds/...

http://freesound.org/people/Veiler/sounds/209872/

This game is made using the awesome html5 game framework Phaser
